li.label: Happy with new self
li.description: I dreamt to be a happiest boy before, now I'm a happiest girl.

li.label: Happy with a dick
li.description: Woah... This thing is awesome! How could I live without it before!

li.description: Seriously, it is mine now. I want it back.

li.description: Aww come on! Give it back!
